duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the development, implementation, and improvement of asset management processes and strategies to ensure regulatory and security compliance, efficiency, and operational effectiveness.
Serve as the custodian of the Process Library (the formal record of ITAM processes).
Collaborate with AMDB owners to ensure accurate and up-to-date records of hardware assets.
Ensure compliance with internal and federal regulatory requirements.
Conduct regular audits to assess adherence to policies and identify potential risks.
Analyze asset management data to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for process improvement.
Assist in the development of training programs and materials to educate employees on the HAM standard, policies, procedures, compliance guidelines, and federal regulatory requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience required. Master's degree preferred.
